titles.title: Courage isn't needed when it's easy

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Courage isn't needed when it's easy
And victories aren't won without a fight
But we have One who makes the way before us
And He has ever kept us by His side

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I am determined, I've made up my mind
I will not falter nor be left behind
When there are valleys or mountains to climb
Kept by new mercies, in Your strength
I'll rise
I will rise
I will rise

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Now there've been times when people said it's over
And in my mind I thought that they were right
But nothing is impossible with Jesus
I hear His voice and never leave His side

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
And the chains that used to bind me
Are now on the floor behind me
To remind me: keep climbing
And the family surrounding me
Will share my burdens willingly
And help me be strong
